page.shortlink: ux viewbox builder viewbox properties autorefresh onchange
page.description: Customizes the refresh behavior for the ViewBox when the control's value changes.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Auto-refresh when ViewBox value changes]* property controls whether or not the ViewBox should be redrawn when the value of the control changes. The ViewBox's value is changed when the [{dialog.object}.setValue()] function is called or when the user taps/clicks a selectable item in the ViewBox to select or de-select it.
If not checked, you can programmatically refresh the control using the ViewBox's [.refresh()] JavaScript method.
